  1. 1 year

Markup

<article class="c-accordion w-1/2 m-auto">
  <button aria-controls="toggle-baby" aria-expanded="true" class="c-accordion__toggle active" data-js="accordion">
    <header class="c-accordion__header bg-pink grid grid-cols-3">
      <div class="c-accordion__header--primary col-span-2">
        <h3 class="m-0 px-6 pt-4">Baby</h3>
        <p class="m-0 px-6 pb-4">0-11 months</p>
      </div>
      <div class="c-accordion__header--secondary">
        <span class="c-accordion__toggle-active">hide<svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon--small">
            <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron-up"></use>
          </svg>
        </span>
        <span class="c-accordion__toggle-inactive">show<svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon--small">
            <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron-down"></use>
          </svg>
        </span>
      </div>
    </header>
  </button>
  <div aria-hidden="false" class="c-accordion__body bg-pink-dark active" id="toggle-baby" role="region">
    <div class="c-accordion__list">
      <ol>
        <li>
          <a class="button--primary bg-white border-white text-pink block" href="#">0 months</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a class="button--primary bg-white border-white text-pink block" href="#">4 months</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a class="button--primary bg-white border-white text-pink block" href="#">6 months</a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a class="button--primary bg-white border-white text-pink block" href="#">9 months</a>
        </li>
      </ol>
    </div>
  </div>
</article>
<article class="c-accordion w-1/2 m-auto mt-2">
  <button aria-controls="toggle-toddler" aria-expanded="true" class="c-accordion__toggle active" data-js="accordion">
    <header class="c-accordion__header bg-orange grid grid-cols-3">
      <div class="c-accordion__header--primary col-span-2">
        <h3 class="m-0 px-6 pt-4">Toddler</h3>
        <p class="m-0 px-6 pb-4">1-3 years</p>
      </div>
      <div class="c-accordion__header--secondary">
        <span class="c-accordion__toggle-active">hide<svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon--small">
            <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron-up"></use>
          </svg>
        </span>
        <span class="c-accordion__toggle-inactive">show<svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon--small">
            <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron-down"></use>
          </svg>
        </span>
      </div>
    </header>
  </button>
  <div aria-hidden="false" class="c-accordion__body bg-orange-dark active" id="toggle-toddler" role="region">
    <div class="c-accordion__list">
      <ol>
        <li>
          <a class="button--primary bg-white border-white text-orange block" href="#">1 year</a>
        </li>

</article>
